text: "Get Lucky" is a funk/disco/pop song by French electronic music duo Daft Punk featuring American musicians Pharrell Williams and Nile Rodgers, released on April 19, 2013. It is from Daft Punk's fourth and final studio album Random Access Memories. Commercially, it reached the top 10 in 27 countries. title: Get Lucky (Daft Punk song)
